page.title: 05LOW EDGES COUNCIL ESTATE
page.content: Low Edges is a mainly council built estate. The housing is terraced town houses and flats. Special bungalows and old persons residences have been built near to the main shopping area. There is a parade of shops on the main Low Edges Road which covers the essential needs of most people. A public house,church,health centre and Infant/Junior school are adjacent to the shops. A leisure facility of a large grass playing area,tennis courts,bowling green,childrens playground and cafe is just south of the main road behind the school.
